job.title: Backend Software Engineer - SF
job.description: tinder brings people together with tens of millions of users hundreds of millions of downloads billion swipes per day million matches per day and a presence in every country on earth our reach is expansiveand rapidly growingltbrgtltbrgtat tinder we are passionate about building software to bring our growing global user base one swipe closer to a new adventure we empower all team members to contribute solutions this is not a top down organization we feel it is important to learn from one another and grow as a teamltbrgtltbrgtas a backend engineer at tinder you will have an outsized impact and ownership of the most visible aspects of the tinder app we are deeply invested in challenging norms constantly improving architecture design exploring emergent tech and ideas and leveraging new technologies in interesting ways to deliver an app that is widely known the world overltbrgtltbrgt by applying to this role you will be considered for all backend roles currently available in our la palo alto and san francisco offices we currently work together remotely and weve adapted our recruiting processes to accommodate virtual interviews with prospective hiresltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtwhat youll doltbrgtltstronggtltligtdesign develop and operate scalable and resilient distributed services that run on kubernetes or ecsltligtltligtcollaborate with various functional teams across tinder on the expansion of our service platformltligtltligtdeliver the team roadmap and product featuresltligtltligtrecruit encourage and develop other team membersltbrgtltbrgtltligtltstronggtwhat youll needltbrgtltstronggtltligt years of industry work experienceltligtltligtexcellent knowledge of computer science fundamentals with strong competencies in data structures algorithms and codingltligtltligtexperience in designing and building distributed backend systems handling high volumes of trafficltligtltligtexperience in handling ambiguous business requirements with excellent prioritization time management abilities and a focus on executionltligtltligtpassion to tackle exciting engineering problems and make continuous improvementsltligtltligtexcellent knowledge and experience with a backend language like java nodejs go etcltbrgtltbrgtltligtltstronggtnice to havesltbrgtltstronggtltligtexperience with cloud computing systems such as aws azure or google cloud platformltligtltligtexperience in design and development using nosql such as dynamodb or cassandraltligtltligtexperience with redis elasticsearch kafka and sparkltligtltligtexperience with agile development methodology and cicdltligtltligtexperience with docker containersltbrgtltbrgtltligtltstronggtas part of our team youll enjoyltbrgtltstronggtltligt working on a product that has an immediate impact on peoples lives all around the worldltligtltligt collaborating with a team of creative fun and driven colleaguesltligtltligt comprehensive health coverage competitive salary k employer match employee stock purchase plan esppltligtltligt other perks and wellness benefits like a fitness membership subsidy paid concierge medical membership pet insurance offerings and a commuter subsidyltligtltligt a robust learning development offering including our mentormatch program access to a library of online learning courses through udemy and an annual ld stipendltligtltligt access to mental health resourcesltligtltligt fertility preservation benefitsltligtltligt no meeting wednesdays and access to a wide range of product and service discounts through perkspotltligtltligt charitable donations match up to annuallyltligtltligt monthly and weekly interactive virtual events including book club trivia with prizes and yoga workoutsltligtltligt the opportunity to join six active employee resource groups ergsltbrgtltbrgtltligtat tinder we dont just accept difference we celebrate it we support it and we thrive on it for the benefit of our employees our product and our community we strive to make our workplace an inclusive and diverse environment giving people from all walks of life the opportunity to have a voice we champion and encourage those who bring different perspectives ideas and creativity to join our team dedicated to bringing people together across the globe tinder is proud to be an equal opportunity workplace where we welcome all people regardless of sex gender identity race ethnicity disability or other lived experience
